posts.post_content:
Looking to buy the following T210s in graded or ungraded, any condition if they have eye appeal:
Series 4 Aylor, Orcutt
Series 5 Lave Cross, Drumm
Series 6 Horn, Mulvain, Toney, Whitaker
Series 7 Dwyer, Galvin, Gillespie, Handibe, Kelly Mascot card, Mayer, Merchant, O’Halloran. 

Thanks for looking. PM or email me if you have any of these for sale.

Bob, 

I will be breaking a complete set(less Jackson) in my Fall auction. Singles, teams, etc.

Unless some aspiring collector wants the opportunity of a lifetime to acquire all 639 at once.

Scott

[quote name="sb1" post=2326040]Bob, 

I will be breaking a complete set(less Jackson) in my Fall auction. Singles, teams, etc.

Unless some aspiring collector wants the opportunity of a lifetime to acquire all 639 at once.

Scott[/QUOTE]

Scott, I’ll be watching, the competition should be brutal for some of these cards. Glad to hear from you, hope to see you at the National in Chicago.
I'll be there with the complete T210 set for viewing..

[quote name="sb1" post=2326095]I'll be there with the complete T210 set for viewing..[/QUOTE]

That would be awesome to see. Will be bidding in that auction.:)
